explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a black hat and a black V-neck T-shirt is standing in front of a sink by a countertop. He is holding a transparent bat with both hands, the lower end of which is placed on a metal bracket by the sink. In the upper left corner of the screen, there are black English subtitles that read "How do you wash the bat?".

[0-9] He then rotates the bat, presses it down, and the metal bracket sprays a jet of water into the bat. Afterward, the man picks up the bat, pours out the water inside, places the bottom of the bat back on the metal bracket, and repeats the rinsing action. He then removes the bat from the metal bracket.
